4.text: Restart due to RF fatal error

targets.query:
from(bucket: "main_data")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Advantech")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["tag"] == "${sensor}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "Device_Events")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
      _time: r._time,
      _value: r._value
    }))
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "main_data")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Advantech")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["tag"] == "${sensor}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "Device_PowerSrc")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
      _time: r._time,
      _value: r._value
    }))
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "main_data")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Advantech")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["tag"] == "${sensor}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "Device_BatteryVolt")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
    _time: r._time,
    _value: r._value / 1000.0,
  }))
  |> yield(name: "last")

panels.description: High Alarm Status of Velocity RMS

targets.query:
from(bucket: "main_data")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Advantech")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["tag"] == "${sensor}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "Accelerometer_X-Axis_SenEvent" or r["_field"] == "Accelerometer_Y-Axis_SenEvent" or r["_field"] == "Accelerometer_Z-Axis_SenEvent")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
      _time: r._time,
      _value: r._value,
      _field: if r._field == "Accelerometer_X-Axis_SenEvent" then "X-Axis High Alarm" 
      else if r._field == "Accelerometer_Y-Axis_SenEvent" then "Y-Axis High Alarm" 
      else "Z-Axis High Alarm"
    }))
  |> yield(name: "mean")

targets.query:
from(bucket: "main_data")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Advantech")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["tag"] == "${sensor}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "Accelerometer_X-Axis_OAVelocity" 
  or r["_field"] == "Accelerometer_Y-Axis_OAVelocity" 
  or r["_field"] == "Accelerometer_Z-Axis_OAVelocity")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
      _time: r._time,
      _value: r._value / 100.0,
      _field: if r._field == "Accelerometer_X-Axis_OAVelocity" then "X-Axis OAVelocity" 
      else if r._field == "Accelerometer_Y-Axis_OAVelocity" then "Y-Axis OAVelocity" 
      else "Z-Axis OAVelocity"
    }))
  |> yield(name: "mean")

panels.description:
Crest Factor -    ()      (RMS) .    :
 CrestFactor = Peak Value / RMS Value.
